page.title: 14INDUSTRY & TRADE IN DUDLEY 1
page.content: Historically the local economy has been dominated by{metal}and{ {engineering industries}.Most companies are fairly small,employing less than 500 people.The tradition of the skilled craftsmansetting up his own small business is still strong. A wide variety of metal goods is produced,from heavy engineering castings to nuts and bolts.Amongst the many engineering firms are those producing components for the car industry,and machine tools. There are also{plastics,textile, {chemical}and {construction industries, and newer companies using the latest{ {computerised manufacturing technology. {Service industries}too are growing in importance. This is a period of{recession, especially in traditional metal based industries so unemployment has risen.
